trans-unit.source: Provides compilation services for ASP.NET applications.
trans-unit.target: 为 ASP.NET 应用程序提供编译服务。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.Compilation.ClientBuildManager> class offers methods and properties for compiling ASP.NET Web applications, and retrieving the generated assemblies or generated source code.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Web.Compilation.ClientBuildManager>类提供方法和属性用于编译 ASP.NET Web 应用程序和检索生成的程序集或生成源代码。

trans-unit.source: Instances of the class are established in the client's application domain and provide access to the ASP.NET build system outside of Microsoft Internet Information Services (IIS).
trans-unit.target: 类的实例在客户端的应用程序域中建立并提供对 ASP.NET 生成系统 Microsoft Internet 信息服务 (IIS) 外部访问。

trans-unit.source: The class can be used to develop customized tools for compiling Web applications.
trans-unit.target: 类可以用于开发编译 Web 应用程序的自定义的工具。

trans-unit.source: The command-line tool `aspnet_compiler` uses the <xref:System.Web.Compilation.ClientBuildManager> class.
trans-unit.target: 命令行工具`aspnet_compiler`使用<xref:System.Web.Compilation.ClientBuildManager>类。

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <see cref="T:System.Web.Compilation.ClientBuildManager" /> class.
trans-unit.target: 初始化 <see cref="T:System.Web.Compilation.ClientBuildManager" /> 类的新实例。

trans-unit.source: The virtual path to the application root.
trans-unit.target: 应用程序根目录的虚拟路径。

trans-unit.source: The physical path to the application root.
trans-unit.target: 应用程序根目录的物理路径。

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <see cref="T:System.Web.Compilation.ClientBuildManager" /> class without a specified target directory or precompilation flags.
trans-unit.target: 在不指定目标目录或预编译标志的情况下初始化 <see cref="T:System.Web.Compilation.ClientBuildManager" /> 类的新实例。

trans-unit.source: The virtual path to the application root.
trans-unit.target: 应用程序根目录的虚拟路径。

trans-unit.source: The physical path to the application root.
trans-unit.target: 应用程序根目录的物理路径。

trans-unit.source: The target directory for precompilation.
trans-unit.target: 用于预编译的目标目录。

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <see cref="T:System.Web.Compilation.ClientBuildManager" /> class with the specified target directory.
trans-unit.target: 使用指定的目标目录初始化 <see cref="T:System.Web.Compilation.ClientBuildManager" /> 类的新实例。

trans-unit.source: This form of the constructor is typically used with precompilation, as it specifies a precompilation target directory.
trans-unit.target: 这种形式的构造函数通常用于预编译，因为它指定预编译目标目录。

trans-unit.source: The virtual path to the application root.
trans-unit.target: 应用程序根目录的虚拟路径。

trans-unit.source: The physical path to the application root.
trans-unit.target: 应用程序根目录的物理路径。

trans-unit.source: The target directory for precompilation.
trans-unit.target: 用于预编译的目标目录。

trans-unit.source: Values that determine the precompilation behavior.
trans-unit.target: 确定预编译行为的值。

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <see cref="T:System.Web.Compilation.ClientBuildManager" /> class with the specified target directory and compilation parameter.
trans-unit.target: 使用指定的目标目录和编译参数初始化 <see cref="T:System.Web.Compilation.ClientBuildManager" /> 类的新实例。

trans-unit.source: This form of the constructor is typically used with precompilation, as it specifies a precompilation target directory and precompilation flags.
trans-unit.target: 这种形式的构造函数通常用于预编译，因为它指定了预编译目标目录和预编译的标志。

trans-unit.source: The virtual path of the application root.
trans-unit.target: 应用程序根的虚拟路径。

trans-unit.source: The physical path of the application root.
trans-unit.target: 应用程序根目录的物理路径。

trans-unit.source: The target directory for precompilation.
trans-unit.target: 用于预编译的目标目录。

trans-unit.source: Values that determine the precompilation behavior.
trans-unit.target: 确定预编译行为的值。

trans-unit.source: The type-description provider to use.
trans-unit.target: 要使用的类型说明提供程序。

trans-unit.source: This parameter is primarily used to support the multi-targeting infrastructure in Visual Studio.
trans-unit.target: 此参数主要用于支持 Visual Studio 中的多目标基础结构。

trans-unit.source: It is used to retrieve metadata about types that is filtered for specific versions of the .NET Framework.
trans-unit.target: 它用于检索有关针对特定版本 .NET Framework 筛选的类型的元数据。

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <see cref="T:System.Web.Compilation.ClientBuildManager" /> class by using the specified virtual directory, source directory, target directory, compilation parameter, and type-description provider.
trans-unit.target: 使用指定的虚拟目录、源目录、目标目录、编译参数和类型说明提供程序初始化 <see cref="T:System.Web.Compilation.ClientBuildManager" /> 类的新实例。

trans-unit.source: Occurs when an application domain is shut down.
trans-unit.target: 在应用程序域关闭时发生。

trans-unit.source: Occurs when an application domain is started.
trans-unit.target: 在应用程序域启动时发生。

trans-unit.source: Occurs when an application domain is unloaded.
trans-unit.target: 在应用程序域卸载时发生。

trans-unit.source: Gets the physical path to the directory used for code generation.
trans-unit.target: 获取用于代码生成的目录的物理路径。

trans-unit.source: A <see cref="T:System.String" /> containing the directory path used for code generation.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="T:System.String" />，包含用于代码生成的目录路径。

trans-unit.source: The directory for code generation is typically in the temporary ASP.NET files directory.
trans-unit.target: 代码生成的目录通常是临时 ASP.NET 文件目录。

trans-unit.source: Compiles application-dependent files, such as files in the App_Code directory, the Global.asax file, resource files, and Web references.
trans-unit.target: 编译与应用程序相关的文件，例如，App_Code 目录中的文件、Global.asax 文件、资源文件和 Web 引用。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.Compilation.ClientBuildManager.CompileApplicationDependencies%2A> method ensures that resources, Web references, files in the App_Code directory, .browser files in the App_Browsers directory, and the Global.asax file are compiled.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Web.Compilation.ClientBuildManager.CompileApplicationDependencies%2A>方法可以确保编译的资源、 Web 引用、 App_Code 目录中的文件、.browser App_Browsers 目录中的文件和 Global.asax 文件。

trans-unit.source: Compiles the file represented by the virtual path.
trans-unit.target: 编译按虚拟路径表示的文件。

trans-unit.source: The path to the file to be compiled.
trans-unit.target: 待编译文件的路径。

trans-unit.source: Compiles the file represented by the virtual path.
trans-unit.target: 编译按虚拟路径表示的文件。

trans-unit.source: The path to the file to be compiled.
trans-unit.target: 待编译文件的路径。

trans-unit.source: The object to receive status information from compilation.
trans-unit.target: 接收编译状态信息的对象。

trans-unit.source: Compiles the file represented by the virtual path and provides a callback class to receive status information about the build.
trans-unit.target: 编译由虚拟路径表示的文件，并提供一个回调类来接收有关生成的状态信息。

trans-unit.source: <paramref name="virtualPath" /> is null.
trans-unit.target: <paramref name="virtualPath" /> 为 null。

trans-unit.source: The type of object to be created.
trans-unit.target: 要创建的对象的类型。

trans-unit.source: <see langword="true" /> to throw an exception if the object has already been created in the application domain of the ASP.NET runtime; otherwise, <see langword="false" />.
trans-unit.target: 如果已在 ASP.NET 运行时的应用程序域中创建了对象，则为 <see langword="true" /> 以引发异常；否则为 <see langword="false" />。

trans-unit.source: Creates an object in the application domain of the ASP.NET runtime.
trans-unit.target: 在 ASP.NET 运行时的应用程序域中创建一个对象。

trans-unit.source: An object in the application domain of the ASP.NET runtime.
trans-unit.target: 在 ASP.NET 运行时的应用程序域中的一个对象。

trans-unit.source: <paramref name="type" /> is <see langword="null" />.
trans-unit.target: <paramref name="type" /> 为 <see langword="null" />。

trans-unit.source: The object already exists in the application domain and <paramref name="failIfExists" /> is <see langword="true" />.
trans-unit.target: 对象已存在于应用程序域中，且 <paramref name="failIfExists" /> 为 <see langword="true" />。

trans-unit.source: The virtual path to the file.
trans-unit.target: 文件的虚拟路径。

trans-unit.source: The contents of the file.
trans-unit.target: 文件的内容。

trans-unit.source: When this method returns, contains a dictionary of line pragmas.
trans-unit.target: 此方法返回时，包含一个行杂注的字典。

trans-unit.source: Generates code from the contents of a file.
trans-unit.target: 根据文件内容生成代码。

trans-unit.source: A <see cref="T:System.String" /> containing the generated code.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="T:System.String" />，包含生成的代码。

trans-unit.source: <paramref name="virtualPath" /> is null.
trans-unit.target: <paramref name="virtualPath" /> 为 null。

trans-unit.source: Returns the codeDOM tree, compiler type, and compiler parameters for a file represented by a virtual path.
trans-unit.target: 为按虚拟路径表示的文件返回 codeDOM 树、编译器类型和编译器参数。

trans-unit.source: The virtual path to the file.
trans-unit.target: 文件的虚拟路径。

trans-unit.source: When this method returns, contains the codeDOM provider type used for code generation and compilation.
trans-unit.target: 此方法返回时，包含用于代码生成和编译的 codeDOM 提供程序类型。

trans-unit.source: When this method returns, contains the properties that define how the file will be compiled.
trans-unit.target: 此方法返回时，包含定义如何编译文件的属性。

trans-unit.source: When this method returns, contains a dictionary of line pragmas.
trans-unit.target: 此方法返回时，包含一个行杂注的字典。

trans-unit.source: Returns the codeDOM tree, compiler type, and compiler parameters for a file represented by a virtual path.
trans-unit.target: 为按虚拟路径表示的文件返回 codeDOM 树、编译器类型和编译器参数。

trans-unit.source: A <see cref="T:System.CodeDom.CodeCompileUnit" /> for the given file.
trans-unit.target: 给定文件的 <see cref="T:System.CodeDom.CodeCompileUnit" />。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.Compilation.ClientBuildManager.GenerateCodeCompileUnit%2A> method retrieves information needed to compile a file.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Web.Compilation.ClientBuildManager.GenerateCodeCompileUnit%2A>方法检索编译文件所需的信息。

trans-unit.source: In addition to a <xref:System.CodeDom.CodeCompileUnit> object as a return value, it returns three `out` parameters.
trans-unit.target: 除了<xref:System.CodeDom.CodeCompileUnit>对象作为返回值，它返回三个`out`参数。

trans-unit.source: The `codeDomProviderType` parameter returns the provider type for generating and compiling the file.
trans-unit.target: `codeDomProviderType`参数返回用于生成和编译该文件提供程序类型。

trans-unit.source: The `compilerParameters` parameter contains properties that determine compilation behavior.
trans-unit.target: `compilerParameters`参数包含确定编译行为的属性。

trans-unit.source: The `linePragmasTable` parameter contains a dictionary of line pragmas.
trans-unit.target: `linePragmasTable`参数包含行杂注的字典。

trans-unit.source: The virtual path to the file.
trans-unit.target: 文件的虚拟路径。

trans-unit.source: The contents of the file represented by the <c>virtualPath</c> parameter.
trans-unit.target: <c>virtualPath</c> 参数所表示的文件的内容。

trans-unit.source: When this method returns, contains the codeDOM provider type used for code generation and compilation.
trans-unit.target: 此方法返回时，包含用于代码生成和编译的 codeDOM 提供程序类型。

trans-unit.source: When this method returns, contains the properties that define how the file represented by the <c>virtualPath</c> parameter will be compiled.
trans-unit.target: 此方法返回时，结果包含一些属性，其中定义了 <c>virtualPath</c> 参数所表示的文件的编译方式。

trans-unit.source: When this method returns, contains a dictionary of line pragmas.
trans-unit.target: 此方法返回时，包含一个行杂注的字典。

trans-unit.source: Returns the contents, codeDOM tree, compiler type, and compiler parameters for a file represented by a virtual path.
trans-unit.target: 返回虚拟路径所表示的文件的内容、codeDOM 树、编译器类型和编译器参数。

trans-unit.source: A <see cref="T:System.CodeDom.CodeCompileUnit" /> for the given file.
trans-unit.target: 给定文件的 <see cref="T:System.CodeDom.CodeCompileUnit" />。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.Compilation.ClientBuildManager.GenerateCodeCompileUnit%2A> method retrieves information needed to compile a file.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Web.Compilation.ClientBuildManager.GenerateCodeCompileUnit%2A>方法检索编译文件所需的信息。

trans-unit.source: In addition to a <xref:System.CodeDom.CodeCompileUnit> object as a return value, it returns three `out` parameters.
trans-unit.target: 除了<xref:System.CodeDom.CodeCompileUnit>对象作为返回值，它返回三个`out`参数。

trans-unit.source: The `codeDomProviderType` parameter returns the provider type for generating and compiling the file.
trans-unit.target: `codeDomProviderType`参数返回用于生成和编译该文件提供程序类型。

trans-unit.source: The `compilerParameters` parameter contains properties that determine compilation behavior.
trans-unit.target: `compilerParameters`参数包含确定编译行为的属性。

trans-unit.source: The `linePragmasTable` parameter contains a dictionary of line pragmas.
trans-unit.target: `linePragmasTable`参数包含行杂注的字典。

trans-unit.source: <paramref name="virtualPath" /> is null.
trans-unit.target: <paramref name="virtualPath" /> 为 null。

trans-unit.source: Gets the directories with files that, when changed, cause the application domain to shut down.
trans-unit.target: 获取包含特定文件的目录，这些文件如果更改，会导致应用程序域关闭。

trans-unit.source: A <see cref="T:System.String" /> array containing the top-level directory names.
trans-unit.target: 包含顶级目录名称的 <see cref="T:System.String" /> 数组。

trans-unit.source: Changes to files in specific top-level directories cause the application domain to shut down.
trans-unit.target: 对特定的顶级目录中的文件的更改会导致应用程序域关闭。

trans-unit.source: Files within the Bin, App_Code, Global_Resources, Web References, and App_Browsers directories are monitored to detect any changes.
trans-unit.target: Bin、 App_Code、 Global_Resources、 Web 引用和 App_Browsers 目录中的文件监视以检测任何更改。

trans-unit.source: When changes are detected, the application domain is shut down.
trans-unit.target: 检测到更改后，应用程序域关闭的情况下。

trans-unit.source: Gets a collection of browser elements.
trans-unit.target: 获取浏览器元素的集合。

trans-unit.source: An <see cref="T:System.Collections.IDictionary" /> containing browser elements.
trans-unit.target: 包含浏览器元素的 <see cref="T:System.Collections.IDictionary" />。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Collections.IDictionary> object contains browser names for the keys and <xref:System.Web.UI.Triplet> objects for the values.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Collections.IDictionary>对象包含的键的浏览器名称和<xref:System.Web.UI.Triplet>对象的值。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.UI.Triplet> objects each contain the name of the parent browser element, a description, and the depth of the browser element in the tree.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Web.UI.Triplet>对象每个包含父浏览器元素、 说明和在树中的浏览器元素深度的名称。

trans-unit.source: The directory about which to retrieve information.
trans-unit.target: 要检索其相关信息的目录。

trans-unit.source: When this method returns, contains the provider type used for code generation and compilation.
trans-unit.target: 此方法返回时，包含用于代码生成和编译的提供程序类型。

trans-unit.source: When this method returns, contains the properties that define how the file will be compiled.
trans-unit.target: 此方法返回时，包含定义如何编译文件的属性。

trans-unit.source: When this method returns, contains the directory for files generated from non-code files.
trans-unit.target: 此方法返回时，包含用于存储根据非代码文件生成的文件的目录。

trans-unit.source: Gets information about the compiler type, compiler parameters, and the directory in which to store code files generated from non-code files such as .wsdl files.
trans-unit.target: 获取与编译器类型、编译器参数以及用来存储根据非代码文件（如 .wsdl 文件）生成的代码文件的目录有关的信息。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.Compilation.ClientBuildManager.GetCodeDirectoryInformation%2A> method retrieves information needed to build a code directory.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Web.Compilation.ClientBuildManager.GetCodeDirectoryInformation%2A>方法检索生成的代码目录所需的信息。

trans-unit.source: It returns this information through three `out` parameters.
trans-unit.target: 它将返回此信息通过三个`out`参数。

trans-unit.source: The `codeDomProviderType` parameter returns the provider type for generating and compiling the files in the code directory.
trans-unit.target: `codeDomProviderType`参数返回用于生成和编译代码目录中的文件提供程序类型。

trans-unit.source: The `compilerParameters` parameter contains properties that determine compilation behavior.
trans-unit.target: `compilerParameters`参数包含确定编译行为的属性。

trans-unit.source: The `generatedFilesDir` parameter stores the directory path containing all the code files generated from non-code files in the code directory, such as .wsdl files.
trans-unit.target: `generatedFilesDir`参数将存储包含从在代码目录中，如.wsdl 文件的非代码文件生成的所有代码文件的目录路径。

trans-unit.source: <paramref name="virtualCodeDir" /> is null.
trans-unit.target: <paramref name="virtualCodeDir" /> 为 null。

trans-unit.source: The virtual path of the file to compile.
trans-unit.target: 要编译的文件的虚拟路径。

trans-unit.source: Compiles the file represented by the virtual path and returns its compiled type.
trans-unit.target: 编译由虚拟路径表示的文件，并返回其编译类型。

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="T:System.Type" /> of the compiled file.
trans-unit.target: 经过编译的文件的 <see cref="T:System.Type" />。

trans-unit.source: <paramref name="virtualPath" /> is null.
trans-unit.target: <paramref name="virtualPath" /> 为 null。

trans-unit.source: The virtual path to the file.
trans-unit.target: 文件的虚拟路径。

trans-unit.source: When this method returns, contains the provider type used for code generation and compilation.
trans-unit.target: 此方法返回时，包含用于代码生成和编译的提供程序类型。

trans-unit.source: When this method returns, contains the properties that define how the file will be compiled.
trans-unit.target: 此方法返回时，包含定义如何编译文件的属性。

trans-unit.source: Returns the compiler type and parameters that are used to build a file represented by a virtual path.
trans-unit.target: 返回用来生成虚拟路径所表示的文件的编译器类型和参数。

trans-unit.source: <paramref name="virtualPath" /> is null.
trans-unit.target: <paramref name="virtualPath" /> 为 null。

trans-unit.source: The full physical path to a generated file.
trans-unit.target: 所生成文件的完整物理路径。

trans-unit.source: Returns the virtual path of a generated file.
trans-unit.target: 返回所生成文件的虚拟路径。

trans-unit.source: A <see cref="T:System.String" /> containing the virtual path for <paramref name="filePath" />.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="T:System.String" />，包含 <paramref name="filePath" /> 的虚拟路径。

trans-unit.source: <paramref name="filePath" /> is null.
trans-unit.target: <paramref name="filePath" /> 为 null。

trans-unit.source: The virtual path of the file to retrieve.
trans-unit.target: 要检索的文件的虚拟路径。

trans-unit.source: Gets the physical path to the generated file for a virtual path.
trans-unit.target: 获取虚拟路径的生成文件的物理路径。

trans-unit.source: A <see cref="T:System.String" /> that contains the physical path to the generated file.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="T:System.String" />，包含所生成文件的物理路径。

trans-unit.source: <paramref name="virtualPath" /> is null.
trans-unit.target: <paramref name="virtualPath" /> 为 null。

trans-unit.source: The configuration name and path.
trans-unit.target: 配置的名称和路径。

trans-unit.source: Returns an array of the assemblies defined in the Bin directory and the <see langword="<assembly>" /> section of the Web configuration file.
trans-unit.target: 返回 Bin 目录和 Web 配置文件的 <see langword="<assembly>" /> 节中定义的程序集的数组。

trans-unit.source: A <see cref="T:System.String" /> array containing paths to code bases in the Bin directory and the <see langword="<assembly>" /> section of the Web configuration file.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="T:System.String" /> 数组，包含指向 Bin 目录和 Web 配置文件的 <see langword="<assembly>" /> 节中的基本代码的路径。

trans-unit.source: <paramref name="virtualPath" /> is null.
trans-unit.target: <paramref name="virtualPath" /> 为 null。

trans-unit.source: Returns the virtual paths to the App_Code directory and its subdirectories in an ASP.NET application.
trans-unit.target: 返回 ASP.NET 应用程序中 App_Code 目录及其子目录的虚拟路径。

trans-unit.source: A <see cref="T:System.String" /> array containing all the virtual paths to code directories in an application.
trans-unit.target: 一个 <see cref="T:System.String" /> 数组，包含应用程序中代码目录的所有虚拟路径。

trans-unit.source: Gives the application domain an infinite lifetime by preventing a lease from being created.
trans-unit.target: 通过防止创建租约来给予应用程序域无限生存期。

trans-unit.source: Always <see langword="null" />.
trans-unit.target: 总是为 <see langword="null" />。

trans-unit.source: This method overrides the <xref:System.MarshalByRefObject.InitializeLifetimeService%2A> method in its base class.
trans-unit.target: 此方法将替代<xref:System.MarshalByRefObject.InitializeLifetimeService%2A>其基类中的方法。

trans-unit.source: It always returns `null` and thereby prevents a lease from being created that would limit the application domain's lifetime.
trans-unit.target: 它始终返回`null`，从而防止创建租约，会限制应用程序域的生存期。

trans-unit.source: The name of the assembly to be identified as a code assembly.
trans-unit.target: 要标识为代码程序集的程序集的名称。

trans-unit.source: Indicates whether an assembly is a code assembly.
trans-unit.target: 指示程序集是否为代码程序集。

trans-unit.source: <see langword="true" /> if the <paramref name="assemblyName" /> parameter matches one of the generated code assemblies; otherwise, <see langword="false" />.
trans-unit.target: 如果 <paramref name="assemblyName" /> 参数与某个生成的代码程序集匹配，则为 <see langword="true" />；否则为 <see langword="false" />。

trans-unit.source: <paramref name="assemblyName" /> is null.
trans-unit.target: <paramref name="assemblyName" /> 为 null。

trans-unit.source: Gets a value that indicates whether an application domain for compiling ASP.NET Web applications has been created.
trans-unit.target: 获取一个值，该值指出用于编译 ASP.NET Web 应用程序的应用程序域是否已经创建。

trans-unit.source: <see langword="true" /> if the application domain for compiling ASP.NET Web applications has been created; otherwise, <see langword="false" />.
trans-unit.target: 如果用于编译 ASP.NET Web 应用程序的应用程序域已经创建，则为 <see langword="true" />；否则为 <see langword="false" />。

trans-unit.source: Precompiles an ASP.NET application.
trans-unit.target: 预编译 ASP.NET 应用程序。

trans-unit.source: ASP.NET supports three forms of precompilation.
trans-unit.target: ASP.NET 支持三种形式的预编译。

trans-unit.source: One form allows for the in-place precompilation of an ASP.NET application.
trans-unit.target: 一种形式允许 ASP.NET 应用程序就地预编译。

trans-unit.source: In this form, the site is deployed to production and then precompiled, which eliminates the need to dynamically compile the site when it is first visited by a user.
trans-unit.target: 在此窗体中，站点是部署到生产环境，然后进行预编译，因而不需要用户首次访问时动态编译站点。

trans-unit.source: The first user of the site will not experience the delay normally encountered on a site that is dynamically compiled.
trans-unit.target: 站点的第一个用户将不会遇到通常遇到动态编译的站点上的延迟。

trans-unit.source: The two other forms of precompilation are used for deployment.
trans-unit.target: 部署使用两个其他形式的预编译。

trans-unit.source: In either form, a layout of the site is generated that can be deployed to a production computer.
trans-unit.target: 在其中任一种形式的布局的站点生成可以部署到生产计算机。

trans-unit.source: One of these forms includes the markup pages so some amount of updating can be performed on the compiled site.
trans-unit.target: 其中一种形式包括标记页，因此可以在编译的站点上执行一定量的更新。

trans-unit.source: The other form does not contain the markup pages and therefore cannot be updated without recompiling the original site.
trans-unit.target: 其他窗体不包含标记页，并因此无法更新无需重新编译原始站点。

trans-unit.source: No source code is deployed to the target environment in either of these forms of precompilation.
trans-unit.target: 没有源代码部署到目标环境中的这些形式的预编译。

trans-unit.source: The application to precompile is defined through the <xref:System.Web.Compilation.ClientBuildManager> constructor.
trans-unit.target: 要预编译的应用程序通过定义<xref:System.Web.Compilation.ClientBuildManager>构造函数。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.Compilation.ClientBuildManagerParameter> object of the <xref:System.Web.Compilation.ClientBuildManager.%23ctor%2A> constructor defines which of the three forms of precompilation to perform.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Web.Compilation.ClientBuildManagerParameter>对象<xref:System.Web.Compilation.ClientBuildManager.%23ctor%2A>构造函数定义的三种形式的预编译才能执行。

trans-unit.source: A developer can precompile a Web site with the `aspnet_compiler` command-line tool or by calling the <xref:System.Web.Compilation.ClientBuildManager.PrecompileApplication%2A> method.
trans-unit.target: 开发人员可以预编译网站与`aspnet_compiler`命令行工具或通过调用<xref:System.Web.Compilation.ClientBuildManager.PrecompileApplication%2A>方法。

trans-unit.source: Precompiles an ASP.NET application.
trans-unit.target: 预编译 ASP.NET 应用程序。

trans-unit.source: ASP.NET supports three forms of precompilation.
trans-unit.target: ASP.NET 支持三种形式的预编译。

trans-unit.source: One form allows for the in-place precompilation of an ASP.NET application.
trans-unit.target: 一种形式允许 ASP.NET 应用程序就地预编译。

trans-unit.source: In this form, the site is deployed to production and then precompiled, which eliminates the need to dynamically compile the site when it is first visited by a user.
trans-unit.target: 在此窗体中，站点是部署到生产环境，然后进行预编译，因而不需要用户首次访问时动态编译站点。

trans-unit.source: The first user of the site will not experience the delay normally encountered on a site that is dynamically compiled.
trans-unit.target: 站点的第一个用户将不会遇到通常遇到动态编译的站点上的延迟。

trans-unit.source: The two other forms of precompilation are used for deployment.
trans-unit.target: 部署使用两个其他形式的预编译。

trans-unit.source: In either form, a layout of the site is generated that can be deployed to a production computer.
trans-unit.target: 在其中任一种形式的布局的站点生成可以部署到生产计算机。

trans-unit.source: One of these forms includes the markup pages so some amount of updating can be performed on the compiled site.
trans-unit.target: 其中一种形式包括标记页，因此可以在编译的站点上执行一定量的更新。

trans-unit.source: The other form does not contain the markup pages and therefore cannot be updated without recompiling the original site.
trans-unit.target: 其他窗体不包含标记页，并因此无法更新无需重新编译原始站点。

trans-unit.source: No source code is deployed to the target environment in either of these forms of precompilation.
trans-unit.target: 没有源代码部署到目标环境中的这些形式的预编译。

trans-unit.source: The application to precompile is defined through the <xref:System.Web.Compilation.ClientBuildManager> constructor.
trans-unit.target: 要预编译的应用程序通过定义<xref:System.Web.Compilation.ClientBuildManager>构造函数。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.Compilation.ClientBuildManagerParameter> object of the <xref:System.Web.Compilation.ClientBuildManager.%23ctor%2A> constructor defines which of the three forms of precompilation to perform.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Web.Compilation.ClientBuildManagerParameter>对象<xref:System.Web.Compilation.ClientBuildManager.%23ctor%2A>构造函数定义的三种形式的预编译才能执行。

trans-unit.source: A developer can precompile a Web site with the `aspnet_compiler` command-line tool or by calling the <xref:System.Web.Compilation.ClientBuildManager.PrecompileApplication%2A> method.
trans-unit.target: 开发人员可以预编译网站与`aspnet_compiler`命令行工具或通过调用<xref:System.Web.Compilation.ClientBuildManager.PrecompileApplication%2A>方法。

trans-unit.source: A <see cref="T:System.Web.Compilation.ClientBuildManagerCallback" /> containing the method to call when reporting the result of compilation.
trans-unit.target: 包含报告编译结果时要调用的方法的 <see cref="T:System.Web.Compilation.ClientBuildManagerCallback" />。

trans-unit.source: Precompiles an ASP.NET application and provides a callback method to receive status information about the build.
trans-unit.target: 预编译 ASP.NET 应用程序，并提供回调方法来接收有关生成的状态信息。

trans-unit.source: ASP.NET supports three forms of precompilation.
trans-unit.target: ASP.NET 支持三种形式的预编译。

trans-unit.source: One form allows for the in-place precompilation of an ASP.NET application.
trans-unit.target: 一种形式允许 ASP.NET 应用程序就地预编译。

trans-unit.source: In this form, the site is deployed to production and then precompiled, which eliminates the need to dynamically compile the site when it is first visited by a user.
trans-unit.target: 在此窗体中，站点是部署到生产环境，然后进行预编译，因而不需要用户首次访问时动态编译站点。

trans-unit.source: The first user of the site will not experience the delay normally encountered on a site that is dynamically compiled.
trans-unit.target: 站点的第一个用户将不会遇到通常遇到动态编译的站点上的延迟。

trans-unit.source: The `callback` parameter contains the method to call when reporting the result of compilation.
trans-unit.target: `callback`参数包含报告的编译结果时要调用的方法。

trans-unit.source: The two other forms of precompilation are used for deployment.
trans-unit.target: 部署使用两个其他形式的预编译。

trans-unit.source: In either form, a layout of the site is generated that can be deployed to a production computer.
trans-unit.target: 在其中任一种形式的布局的站点生成可以部署到生产计算机。

trans-unit.source: One of these forms includes the markup pages so some amount of updating can be performed on the compiled site.
trans-unit.target: 其中一种形式包括标记页，因此可以在编译的站点上执行一定量的更新。

trans-unit.source: The other form does not contain the markup pages and therefore cannot be updated without recompiling the original site.
trans-unit.target: 其他窗体不包含标记页，并因此无法更新无需重新编译原始站点。

trans-unit.source: No source code is deployed to the target environment in either of these forms of precompilation.
trans-unit.target: 没有源代码部署到目标环境中的这些形式的预编译。

trans-unit.source: The application to precompile is defined through the <xref:System.Web.Compilation.ClientBuildManager> constructor.
trans-unit.target: 要预编译的应用程序通过定义<xref:System.Web.Compilation.ClientBuildManager>构造函数。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.Compilation.ClientBuildManagerParameter> object of the <xref:System.Web.Compilation.ClientBuildManager.%23ctor%2A> constructor defines which of the three forms of precompilation to perform.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Web.Compilation.ClientBuildManagerParameter>对象<xref:System.Web.Compilation.ClientBuildManager.%23ctor%2A>构造函数定义的三种形式的预编译才能执行。

trans-unit.source: A developer can precompile a Web site with the `aspnet_compiler` command-line tool or by calling the <xref:System.Web.Compilation.ClientBuildManager.PrecompileApplication%2A> method.
trans-unit.target: 开发人员可以预编译网站与`aspnet_compiler`命令行工具或通过调用<xref:System.Web.Compilation.ClientBuildManager.PrecompileApplication%2A>方法。

trans-unit.source: A <see cref="T:System.Web.Compilation.ClientBuildManagerCallback" /> containing the method to call when reporting the result of compilation.
trans-unit.target: 包含报告编译结果时要调用的方法的 <see cref="T:System.Web.Compilation.ClientBuildManagerCallback" />。

trans-unit.source: <see langword="true" /> to perform a clean build, which will first delete all object and intermediate files; <see langword="false" /> to rebuild only those files that have changed.
trans-unit.target: <see langword="true" /> 执行干净生成，这将首先删除所有对象和中间文件；<see langword="false" /> 则仅重新生成那些已更改的文件。

trans-unit.source: Set to true if there is a chance that a dependency might not be picked up by the build environment.
trans-unit.target: 如果存在生成环境可能不选取依赖项的可能性，则设置为 true。

trans-unit.source: Precompiles an ASP.NET application, provides a callback method to receive status information about the build, and indicates whether to create a clean build.
trans-unit.target: 预编译 ASP.NET 应用程序，提供回调方法以接收有关生成的状态信息，并指示是否创建干净生成。

trans-unit.source: ASP.NET supports three forms of precompilation.
trans-unit.target: ASP.NET 支持三种形式的预编译。

trans-unit.source: One form allows for the in-place precompilation of an ASP.NET application.
trans-unit.target: 一种形式允许 ASP.NET 应用程序就地预编译。

trans-unit.source: In this form, the site is deployed to production and then precompiled, which eliminates the need to dynamically compile the site when it is first visited by a user.
trans-unit.target: 在此窗体中，站点是部署到生产环境，然后进行预编译，因而不需要用户首次访问时动态编译站点。

trans-unit.source: The first user of the site will not experience the delay normally encountered on a site that is dynamically compiled.
trans-unit.target: 站点的第一个用户将不会遇到通常遇到动态编译的站点上的延迟。

trans-unit.source: The `callback` parameter contains the method to call when reporting the result of compilation.
trans-unit.target: `callback`参数包含报告的编译结果时要调用的方法。

trans-unit.source: The two other forms of precompilation are used for deployment.
trans-unit.target: 部署使用两个其他形式的预编译。

trans-unit.source: In either form, a layout of the site is generated that can be deployed to a production computer.
trans-unit.target: 在其中任一种形式的布局的站点生成可以部署到生产计算机。

trans-unit.source: One of these forms includes the markup pages so some amount of updating can be performed on the compiled site.
trans-unit.target: 其中一种形式包括标记页，因此可以在编译的站点上执行一定量的更新。

trans-unit.source: The other form does not contain the markup pages and therefore cannot be updated without recompiling the original site.
trans-unit.target: 其他窗体不包含标记页，并因此无法更新无需重新编译原始站点。

trans-unit.source: No source code is deployed to the target environment in either of these forms of precompilation.
trans-unit.target: 没有源代码部署到目标环境中的这些形式的预编译。

trans-unit.source: The application to precompile is defined through the <xref:System.Web.Compilation.ClientBuildManager> constructor.
trans-unit.target: 要预编译的应用程序通过定义<xref:System.Web.Compilation.ClientBuildManager>构造函数。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.Compilation.ClientBuildManagerParameter> object of the <xref:System.Web.Compilation.ClientBuildManager.%23ctor%2A> constructor defines which of the three forms of precompilation to perform.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Web.Compilation.ClientBuildManagerParameter>对象<xref:System.Web.Compilation.ClientBuildManager.%23ctor%2A>构造函数定义的三种形式的预编译才能执行。

trans-unit.source: A developer can precompile a Web site with the `aspnet_compiler` command-line tool or by calling the <xref:System.Web.Compilation.ClientBuildManager.PrecompileApplication%2A> method.
trans-unit.target: 开发人员可以预编译网站与`aspnet_compiler`命令行工具或通过调用<xref:System.Web.Compilation.ClientBuildManager.PrecompileApplication%2A>方法。

trans-unit.source: Terminates the current ASP.NET application.
trans-unit.target: 终止当前 ASP.NET 应用程序。

trans-unit.source: Unloads the application domain for compiling ASP.NET Web applications.
trans-unit.target: 卸载用于编译 ASP.NET Web 应用程序的应用程序域。

trans-unit.source: <see langword="true" /> if the application domain is unloaded; otherwise, <see langword="false" />.
trans-unit.target: 如果卸载了应用程序域，则为 <see langword="true" />；否则为 <see langword="false" />。
